item.title: A Brilliant Rock Mashup That Uses a Mock Facebook Timeline to Feature and Combine Each Band
item.description:
A Brilliant Rock Mashup That Uses a Mock Facebook Timeline to Feature and Combine Each Band

Ithaca Audio created an incredibly brilliant 15-minute mashup that tells the pretty comprehensive "History of Rock" via a mock Facebook timeline in which clips of the bands were featured and where quotes from other rockstars were submitted as comments and likes.

item.title: How to Give Your Room a Cyberpunk Design Makeover
item.description:
How to Give Your Room a Cyberpunk Design Makeover

Cyberpunk is no longer fiction. It is our reality. And DIY is its first name. If you don't know about the cyberpunk genre of science fiction, I cannot tell you what it is, because that is the stuff of Internet holy wars. Search out authors like Philip K.
